# WorldTrackingProvider.Error

**Structure**

An error that can occur during a world-tracking session.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Error
```

## Inspecting world-tracking errors

- **anchor**: The anchor that caused a world-tracking error.
- **code**: The error code.
- **WorldTrackingProvider.Error.Code**: The error codes for errors that world tracking providers throw.
- **errorDescription**: A localized message that describes the error that occurred.

## Providing recovery suggestions

- **recoverySuggestion**: A localized message that describes how someone might recover from the error.
- **failureReason**: A localized message that describes why the error occurred.

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A textual description of the error that occurred.

## Tracking objects

- **init()**: Creates a world-tracking provider.
- **anchorUpdates**: A sequence of updates to anchors a provider tracks.
- **requiredAuthorizations**: The types of authorizations necessary for tracking world anchors.
- **isSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the current runtime environment supports world-tracking providers.
- **allAnchors**: An array of all known world anchors from the world-tracking provider.
- **addAnchor(_:)**: Adds a world anchor you supply to the set of currently tracked anchors.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- Error
- LocalizedError
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
